vital 0.1.0
  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

FMEAN()
Functional mean models
LC()
Model mortality or fertility data using Lee-Carter approach
as_vital()
Coerce to a vital object
aus_fertility
Australian fertility data
aus_mortality
Australian mortality data
autoplot(<fpc_model>)
Plot of functional data model components
collapse_ages()
Collapse upper ages into a single age group. Counts are summed while rates are recomputed.
fitted(<model_fmean>)
Fitted values from a mean model
fitted(<model_lc>)
Fitted values from a mean model
forecast(<model_lc>) forecast(<model_fmean>)
Produce forecasts from a vital model
fpc_model()
Fit a functional principal components model
generate(<mdl_vtl_df>) generate(<mdl_vtl_ts>)
Generate responses from a mable
generate(<model_fmean>)
Generate from a mean model
generate(<model_lc>)
Generate from a mean model
glance(<model_fmean>)
Glance a average method model
glance(<model_lc>)
Glance a average method model
interpolate(<model_lc>) interpolate(<model_fmean>)
Interpolate missing values
life_expectancy()
Compute life expectancy from mortality rates
life_table()
Compute period lifetables from mortality rates
model(<vital>)
Estimate models for vital data
rainbow_plot()
Rainbow plot of demographic data against age
read_hmd()
Read data directly from HMD and construct a vital object for use in other functions
read_hmd_files()
Read data from files downloaded from HMD and construct a vital object for use in other functions
residuals(<model_fmean>)
Residuals from a mean model
residuals(<model_lc>)
Residuals from a mean model
tidy(<model_lc>) tidy(<model_fmean>)
Extract model coefficients from a mable
total_fertility_rate()
Compute total fertility rate from age-specific fertility rates
vital()
Create a vital object
vital_conflicts()
Conflicts between vital packages and other packages
vital_packages()
List all packages loaded by vital
